articles.title: NASA probe leaking asteroid samples after hearty collection - TODAYonline
articles.description: WASHINGTON, D.C. - The U.S. probe that collected a sample from an asteroid earlier this week retrieved so much material that a rock is wedged in the container door, allowing rocks to spill back out into space, NASA officials said on Friday.
